blogPost.excerpt: Meghan Markle is setting the record straight. The former “Suits” star spoke with Oprah Winfrey during a bombshell tell-all on CBS, where she addressed a past rumor that she made Kate Middleton cry prior to her wedding to Prince Harry. She said the situation was actually the opposite, and that it was actually Kate who made her cry and that her sister-in-law ended up apologizing.
blogPost.body: Meghan Markle is setting the record straight. The former “Suits” star spoke with Oprah Winfrey during a bombshell tell-all on CBS, where she addressed a past rumor that she made Kate Middleton cry prior to her wedding to Prince Harry. She said the situation was actually the opposite, and that it was actually Kate who made her cry and that her sister-in-law ended up apologizing.
blogPost.title: Meghan Markle Says Kate Middleton Made Her Cry Before Wedding
blogPost.author: Access

previous.excerpt:
Prince Harry and Meghan Markle's revealing interview with Oprah Winfrey outlined their motivations for breaking from the Royal Family, including Meghan’s suicidal thoughts. 

Watch The National live on YouTube Sunday-Friday at 9 p.m. ET

Subscribe to The National: 
https://www.youtube.com/user/CBCTheNational?sub_confirmation=1

Connect with The National online:
Facebook | https://www.facebook.com/thenational
Twitter | https://twitter.com/CBCTheNational
Instagram | https://www.instagram.com/cbcthenational

More from CBC News | https://www.cbc.ca/news

The National is CBC's flagship nightly news program, featuring the day's top stories with in-depth and original journalism, with hosts Adrienne Arsenault and Andrew Chang in Toronto, Ian Hanomansing in Vancouver and the CBC's chief political correspondent, Rosemary Barton in Ottawa.
previous.title: Prince Harry, Meghan reveal struggles behind royal rift in Oprah interview
